title: The Music of Don McLean
brief_description: This video presents an interview with internationally acclaimed American singer, Don Mclean, interspersed with live on stage performance at the Dominion Theatre, London of some of his best-known songs including “And I love you so”, “American pie”, “Starry starry night”, “Vincent”, “Fools paradise”, and many more. Interviewer: Paul Gambaccini.
